title: Pair Of UWS Rental Buildings Sold At $54M Loss | Flipboard
text: Pair Of UWS Rental Buildings Sold At $54M Loss The two connected Riverside Drive pre-war rental buildings recently sold at a massive 64 percent cut. UPPER WEST SIDE, NY — Did a pair of 120-year-old … [Patch](/@Patch) flipped this story into [New York City, NY Patch](/@patch/new-york-city-ny-patch-qj3aeg7az)•11h Related storyboards Related articles [Famous Italian Sandwich Shop All’Antico Vinaio Is Opening Three More Locations](/@artjose/food-r-ktbmlfjuz/famous-italian-sandwich-shop-all-antico-vinaio-is-opening-three-more-locations/a-ZoW6jTSXTHeswKbjDYOYmw%3Aa%3A92135461-3576f2b556%2Feater.com) All’Antico Vinaio, the famous sandwich shop from Florence, Italy, is opening three more locations in Manhattan. The company, which opened here in 2021, is next headed to the West Village, at 89 Seventh Avenue South, near Barrow Street, on March 2, according to a company spokesperson. Customers who purchase the crispy fish sandwich will be able to get … Join the flipboard community Discover, collect, and share stories for all your interests [Sign up](/signup) More stories from [Upper Manhattan](/topic/uppermanhattan) - Storyboard Celebrate Black History Month by Reading Black AuthorsCurated byJessica Bethel [Books have allowed me to reimagine the world. I rediscovered my affinity for reading years back when I began my book club, Literature Noir. I realized my relationship with books when I was younger was great, however, I very rarely read books by authors who looked like me. As an adult, I'm intentional about the books I read, because Black literature matters. In this collection, you will find some of my favorite books of various genres, interviews, and Black literary advocates.](/@4eyedgirl/celebrate-black-history-month-by-reading-black-authors-h648au4c5l1ltlhm) [Harlem residents oppose proposal to convert apartments into migrant housing](/topic/uppermanhattan/harlem-residents-oppose-proposal-to-convert-apartments-into-migrant-housing/a--K2w8NlYRymXlCSxo6iwEw%3Aa%3A2382672118-de254b8a20%2Fpix11.com) HARLEM, Manhattan (PIX11) — Harlem residents held an emergency meeting Thursday night after learning a vacant luxury residential building would be … [14 Restaurants To Make You Fall In Love With New York Again](/topic/uppermanhattan/14-restaurants-to-make-you-fall-in-love-with-new-york-again/a-41KO1Lg4RmCRTI-soD2i3w%3Aa%3A3233034901-66e6138363%2Ftheinfatuation.com) Sometimes, NYC sucks.
